kpi.name: M1006C236

kpi_info.title: RB SETUP FAIL BLIND HO DUE TO UE NACK WITHOUT MEAS
kpi_info.use: "The number of failed Radio Bearer setups to another frequency with blind handover method due to negative response from the UE when handover was done without monitored cell RSCP/EcNo measurement result.Also M1006C76 is updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP FAILURE is received from the UE after an attempt to establish Radio Bearer on another frequency and the attempt was done to a cell configured by the parameter ADJI-BlindHOTargetCell, without inter-frequency RSCP or EcNo measurement result received from the UE."

kpi.kpi_alias: RB SETUP FAIL BLIND HO DUE TO UE NACK WITHOUT MEAS
